attributes.action: Prevent fireworks being purchased over the counter
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks are being set off all year round, it is not necessary. A lot of animals are petrified of fireworks, they are disruptive and there's no need for them to be purchased.
The local towns have grounds where displays can be organised and monitored.
attributes.background:
Stop fireworks being purchased in shops.
Let local town rugby/football grounds arrange displays.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing rules regarding the purchase and release of fireworks, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks illegal to buy, with the exception of public displays: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591501

Ban the manufacture, import, sale and use of fireworks in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599738

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451

Restrict the use and sale of fireworks to November the 5th and New year's Eve: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595560
